Technique: WOOD-TECHNIQUE; ENGRAVED; WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Greek mummy label
Description: The text on this label was first written in red ink, then carved into the wood and filled with black ink. Originally there were two pieces of wood with rounded ends glued together, but the second one, the back, is now lost. In the centre of the upper edge are two holes next to each other.
